name: presearch-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol server for Presearch API integration

scripts.build: node --input-type=module -e "import fs from 'fs';import path from 'path';if(!fs.existsSync('dist'))fs.mkdirSync('dist',{recursive:true});const copyDir=(src,dest)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(item=>{const srcPath=path.join(src,item);const destPath=path.join(dest,item);if(fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath)}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath)}})};copyDir('src','dist');copyDir('config','dist');fs.writeFileSync('dist/index.js','import(\'./server/server.js\');');"

author: Community
